<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Write access for agent work schedule</description><local_or_existing/><name>st_agent_work_schedule</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = gs.getSession().isLoggedIn();
if (!answer) {
    answer = gs.getProperty('glide.security.allow_unauth_roleless_acl', false);
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-02 00:38:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>c40d612777080110715517e91e5a9926</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>st_agent_work_schedule</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Agent Schedule" source="com.snc.agent_schedule">e87465bec35702108a84ba2ed4013188</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_c40d612777080110715517e91e5a9926</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-13 14:30:35</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

        "263f2c5b888a415db1e54e17a2767b2d": {
          "id": "263f2c5b888a415db1e54e17a2767b2d",
          "name": "Filter Attachments",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var uploaded_list = [];\n    var uploadFailed_list = [];\n    var fileControl = vaInputs.allow_all_file_types.getValue() ? vaInputs.files : vaInputs.files_image_only;\n    var successStatus = [\"available\", null]; // null state when scan is disabled\n    for(var index=0; index<fileControl.getFiles().length; index++) {\n        var file = fileControl.getFiles()[index];\n        var attachment = {\n            \"contentType\": file.contentType,\n            \"fileName\": file.fileName, \n            \"value\": file.value,\n            \"message\" : file.message,\n            \"contentType\" : file.contentType,\n            \"scanState\" : file.scanState,\n            \"fileSize\" : file.fileSize\n        };\n        if (successStatus.indexOf(file.scanState) != -1) {\n            uploaded_list.push(attachment);\n        } else {\n           uploadFailed_list.push(attachment);\n        }\n    }\n\n    vaVars.final_list = JSON.stringify(uploaded_list);\n    vaVars.failed_list = JSON.stringify(uploadFailed_list);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }

        "10fa1ef93ad74dfcbb330321b89052e8": {
          "id": "10fa1ef93ad74dfcbb330321b89052e8",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Upload failed for message",
          "secure": false,
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    var message = gs.getProperty(\"com.glide.cs.general.multi_file_upload_failed_for_msg\");\n    return message;\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "8e053c58fcb345a7ae1062b969683023": {
          "id": "8e053c58fcb345a7ae1062b969683023",
          "name": "Save reuploaded attachments",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    vaVars.failed_list = \"\";\n    var uploaded_list = JSON.parse(vaVars.final_list);\n    var uploadFailed_list = [];\n    var fileControl = vaInputs.allow_all_file_types.getValue() ? vaInputs.reupload_attachment : vaInputs.reupload_attachment_image_only;\n    var successStatus = [\"available\", null]; // null state when scan is disabled\n    for(var index=0; index<fileControl.getFiles().length; index++) {\n        var file = fileControl.getFiles()[index];\n        var attachment = {\n            \"contentType\": file.contentType,\n            \"fileName\": file.fileName, \n            \"value\": file.value,\n            \"message\" : file.message,\n            \"contentType\" : file.contentType,\n            \"scanState\" : file.scanState,\n            \"fileSize\" : file.fileSize\n        };\n        gs.info(\"test file: \"+ JSON.stringify(attachment));\n        if (successStatus.indexOf(file.scanState) != -1) {\n            uploaded_list.push(attachment);\n        } else {\n           uploadFailed_list.push(attachment);\n        }\n    }\n    vaVars.failed_message_count = 0;\n    vaVars.final_list = JSON.stringify(uploaded_list);\n    vaVars.failed_list = JSON.stringify(uploadFailed_list);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
